Headline: #50 Damen  temporary Reroute at Damen/Ainslie.
ShortDescription:
50 Damen buses are temp rrtd in both directions via Ashland, Lawrence, and Damen  due to fire department activity near Damen/Ainslie

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Lawrence, and Damen  due to fire department activity near Damen/Ainslie.

Allow extra travel time.
